alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 01 at 10:03PM CDT until April 04 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE CENTRAL OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND THE EASTERN TEXAS PANHANDLE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE CENTRAL OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND THE EASTERN TEXAS PANHANDLE... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Texas. In Texas...Ochiltree... Lipscomb...Roberts...Hemphill...Gray...Wheeler...Donley and Collingsworth. * 20 Foot Winds...Monday, southwest at 20 to 35 mph, and Tuesday, westerly at 35 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent Monday and 8 percent Tuesday. * Red Flag Threat Index...4 to 7 on Monday and 6 to 8 Tuesday. * Timing...Monday 10 AM to midnight. Tuesday 6 AM to midnight.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.

area.areaDesc: Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts; Wheeler
